entry.label: Download
entry.description: Online instructions for transferring data from one storage device or system to another

entry.label: Information
entry.description: Online information about the resource

entry.label: Offline access
entry.description: Online instructions for requesting the resource from the provider

entry.label: Order
entry.description: Online order process for obtening the resource

entry.label: Search
entry.description: Online search interface for seeking out information about the resource

entry.label: Download registration
entry.description: Manual interaction with an on-line system by registered users following successful authentication and authorisation

entry.label: Download URL
entry.description: Direct access through the given URL endpoint using a specific web protocol

entry.label: UTF8
entry.description: 8-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

entry.label: Curve
entry.description: Bounded, 1-dimensional geometric primitive, representing the continuous image of a line

entry.label: Point
entry.description: Zero-dimensional geometric primitive, representing a position but not having an extent

entry.label: Surface
entry.description: Bounded, connected 2-dimensional geometric primitive, representing the continuous image of a region of a plane

entry.label: Discipline
entry.description: Keyword identifies a branch of instruction or specialized learning

entry.label: Place
entry.description: Keyword identifies a location

entry.label: Stratum
entry.description: Keyword identifies the layer(s) of any deposited substance

entry.label: Temporal
entry.description: Keyword identifies a time period related to the dataset

entry.label: Theme
entry.description: Keyword identifies a particular subject or topic

entry.label: Instrument
entry.description: Keyword describes or cateogorises sample collection or data production tools

entry.label: Project
entry.description: Keyword describes a strategic undertaking encomapssing an organised set of activities

entry.label: Parameter
entry.description: Keyword identifies a phenomenon or group of phenomena in the dataset

entry.label: Platform
entry.description: Keyword identifies a specific vehicle, object, structure or organism capable of bearing instruments or tools for the collection of physical, chemical, geological or biological samples.

entry.label: Platform class
entry.description: Keyword identifies groups of vehicles, objects, structures or organisms capable of bearing instruments or tools for the collection of physical, chemical, geological or biological samples.

entry.label: Departure place
entry.description: Keyword identifies a location where an activity starts

entry.label: Departure country
entry.description: Keyword identifies the country where an activity starts

entry.label: Arrival place
entry.description: Keyword identifies a location where an activity finishes

entry.label: Arrival country
entry.description: Keyword identifies the country where an activity begins

entry.label: Marsden square
entry.description: Keyword identifies a location as encoded geographic co-ordinates for a rectangular polygon following WMO conventions

entry.label: Dataset
entry.description: Information applies to the dataset
